title: Financial reporting community needs to learn from India’s start-up success story, says NFRA chairman
description: “India ranks third globally in terms of the number of start-ups that are becoming unicorns. We all should collectively think if we can do the same thing in the auditing community,” Pandey said in his closing remarks. Pandey noted that NFRA would coordinate with the Ministry of Corporate Affairs to help create enabling frameworks for establishing home-grown audit firms like the Big Four.
